desc: Originating from Japan, handcrafted soufflé pancakes are traditionally served at weddings and other celebrations. Fuwa Fuwa believes every day is a celebration – we want to celebrate the diversity of Toronto and share a little bit of Japanese culture with everyone.

layout.text: Since our pancakes take ~25 minutes to be made fresh, we recommend you to order in advance and get there just in time for your fresh, fluffy pancakes!
